Fairness in Recommendation System

A comprehensive collection of papers, tutorials, resources, etc. related to Fairness in Recommendation System.

知乎专栏

Papers

Organize Fairness-In-Recommendation-System into three categories:

  • Pre-Processing
    • Re-sampling
    • Data Augmentation
    • Re-weighing
    • Influence Function
  • In-Processing
    • Adversary Learning
    • Regularization and Constrained Optimization
    • Reinforcement Learning
    • Re-weighing
    • AutoEncoder
    • Causal Inference
    • Others
  • Post-Processing
    • Slot-wise Re-ranking
    • User-wise Re-ranking
    • Global-wise Re-ranking
  • Survey

Simultaneously, these papers are also marked with some criteria:

  • Group Fairness vs. Individual Fairness
  • User Fairness vs. Item Fairness
